DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to examine whether the compound herbal formula (RHD-1) is effective on HBV Carrier With Abnormal Liver Function.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Compound Herbal Formula (RHD-1) on HBV Carrier With Abnormal Liver Function
DOC.detailed_description: % change HBV DNA title and liver function.
DOC.criteria: 40 < GPT <200 HBV carrier Age: 1865 yrs old Exclusion: Creatinine >2.0 mg/dL Total bilirubin > 2.0mg/dL Not suitable patients diagnosis by physician in charge.
